data

Class AppData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.AppData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResetAll, ScooterListTest, ScooterManage, StationManage, testUserManage, TransactionManage, UserListTest, UserManage

    public class AppData
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity class used to store all data. Initialize when the program start, read data from local files. All lists and methods in this class is provided to all manage classes

    • Method Detail

      • updateData

        protected static void updateData()
        Update all data to local files. Must be called after changing something, unless data will not be saved in local files

      • save

        private static <E extends java.util.Vector> void save(E data,
                                                      java.lang.String location)
        Save the specified data to the specified file. To ensure the data in static files is as same as the running program data
        Type Parameters:
        E - data set type
        Parameters:
        data - the data want to save
        location - the file address

      • read

        private java.util.Vector<?> read(java.lang.String location)
        Read data from specified file
        Parameters:
        location - the file address
        Returns:
        the data set read from local file
